abstract: Attorney for Tony Stewart, whose racecar struck and killed fellow driver Kevin Ward Jr in 2014, says in court papers that Ward, whose family is suing Stewart for gross negligence, was impaired by marijuana at time of accident; lawyer for Ward's family calls accusation 'appalling'; other auto racing news noted.
lead_paragraph: A lawyer for Kevin Ward Jr., a driver who was killed when he was hit by Tony Stewart’s racecar last year, said Stewart’s legal claims in response to a lawsuit were “appalling.”

headline.main: Stewart’s Response to Lawsuit Is Criticized

snippet: A lawyer for Kevin Ward Jr., a driver who was killed when he was hit by Tony Stewart’s racecar last year, said Stewart’s legal claims in response to a lawsuit were “appalling.”
